mapper.select:
select prime.measure_value, prime.unit_code, prime.comment_text, prime.statistical_stratum, prime.location_category, prime.location_status, prime.ref_location_type_code, prime.ref_location_start_date, prime.ref_location_end_date, prime.resource_title, prime.resource_creator, prime.resource_subject, prime.resource_publisher, prime.resource_date, prime.resource_identifier, prime.organization, prime.organization_name, prime.site_id, prime.project_identifier, prime.project_id, (prime.project_id || '-' || prime.site_id) as PRJMLW_ID, prime.data_source
order by prime.data_source_id, prime.organization, prime.project_identifier, prime.site_id
mapper.sql:
select prime.data_source, count (*) as prj_ml_weighting_count
group by rollup(prime.data_source)
